root.message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 5-1-1, translated into en
root.data: The indicator “Sex ratio at birth” is compiled from data from the Population and Housing Census (10-year cycle), the mid-term population and housing census (5-year cycle), and extrapolated from the results of the annual population change - family planning sample survey. The above censuses and censuses are all part of the National Statistical Census Program and conducted by the General Statistics Office. In addition, this indicator is also compiled from administrative data of the Ministry of Health.
